name: Randle the Valiant
description:
Randle is a soldier from a village that is on the border of 2 kingdoms. The village folk earns its living from a valuable mineral called glisserite. They sell this mineral in small portions so that they don't draw any suspicions about the biggest deposit in whole kingdom. One day one of the scout groups of the Alliance discovers about this deposit and they decide to investigate. That's where our journey is begin.

Oyunu motoru olarak Unity'yi, Pixel artlar için ise Aseprite'ı kullandık.
